jobDescription: Lube Technician-Germain of Ann ArborGermain of Ann Arbor is currently seeking recent trade school graduates or candidates with technician training under their belt to fill openings in the service department as Lube Technicians. This position functions as an entry-level technician who is able to perform diagnoses and repairs in most areas, specializing in oil changes and tire rotations.  If you are ready to advance your career in the automotive industry, apply at GermainCareers.com today! Back  Email  Apply Now
